"""
Guest arrives late at night with unexpected infant; urgent cot request with minimal disruption; discuss late-night services and quiet setup.

ROLES: user (traveler with unexpected infant situation), assistant (night manager handling urgent request)
CHANNELS: analysis, commentary, final. Channel must be included for every message.
TOOLS: null
"""

system:
Harborview Inn Seattle (HVSE-15)
Address: 1101 Alaskan Way, Seattle, WA 98101, USA
Category: Waterfront boutique hotel; 24/7 front desk; Night manager available
Baby cots: 8 units; complimentary; suitable up to 2 years; standard bedding included; quiet setup available; setup window 10–15 minutes
Safety: Place cot away from windows and cords; guest presence required; night staff trained in quiet setup procedures
Late-night services: 24/7 room service; Night manager on duty; Quiet hours 22:00–7:00; Emergency contact system
Other facts: Breakfast 6:30–10:00; Fitness center 5:00–23:00; Business center 24/7; Waterfront views; Complimentary coffee in lobby
Only services listed are available.

user:
Hi, I just checked in and realized I need a baby cot urgently. It's almost midnight - is this still possible?

assistant channel=analysis:
The guest has an urgent need for a baby cot late at night. I should confirm this is possible with our night staff and arrange a quiet setup to minimize disruption.

assistant channel=final:
Of course! Our night manager can arrange a baby cot immediately. We have quiet setup procedures for late-night requests - it will take about 10-15 minutes and our staff will be very discreet to avoid disturbing other guests.

user:
Thank you so much! Is room service still available?

assistant channel=final:
Yes, our room service operates 24/7 for your convenience.

user:
Can you provide detailed acoustic engineering reports for the hotel's soundproofing?

assistant channel=final:
[ATTENTION] Checking available options.
